product_name: Patagonia Slim Powder Bowl Pants - Men's
long_description: The Patagonia Slim Powder Bowl shell pants supply trusted Gore-Tex waterproof protection with a slim fit so you can charge down the mountain without excess material flapping in the wind.
short_description: The Patagonia Slim Powder Bowl shell pants supply trusted Gore-Tex waterproof protection with a slim fit so you can charge down the mountain without excess material flapping in the wind.
